page.title: 19RECREATION - KNOWLE
page.content: The most common home{entertainment} is to watch the{television.}Programmes are sent out on four channels. Our own local station is H.T.V.. Films can be seen at a cinema or often on television using a video tape recorder. Many adults like to spend some time at the Pub. Young people enjoy riding a bicycle or going to{youth clubs.}These offer a focal point where they can meet and play sports including the national game, Football. There are a number of open spaces where people can walk or exercise by Jogging. Some firms supply facilities for their employees to meet socially and exercise. The County Council has converted an obsolete airport at Whitchurch into a{Sports {Centre.}Here anyone can take part in a wide variety of sports.
